personal.bio: Specializing in the intersection of Supply Chain Tech and AI. I build high-availability systems that bridge the gap between complex algorithms and physical operations.

highlights: Migrated legacy Blue Yonder WMS to cloud-native microservices.
Engineered trailer scheduling logic reducing RDC demurrage costs.
Deployed 99.9% uptime services via Kubernetes, Rancher, and Grafana.
